verbose_text: While pro fibrotic M2 macrophages are thought to promote fibrosis and angiogenesis upon conventional PDF fluid treatment, in this study it was found that in BLS exposed mouse the pro inflammatory (M1) phenotype was dominant in the peritoneal tissue over M2 subset suggesting a difference in inflammatory response between different PD fluid exposures.
evidence: M2 macrophages are thought to promote fibrosis and angiogenesis
